import sys

h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
h2, w2 = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

#print(h, w, h2, w2)

print((h - h2) * w + (w - w2) * h2)

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h_, w_ = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(h * w - h_ * w_)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(h*w - (h*w - h*w))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h_, w_ = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    print(h * w - (h - h_) * (w - w_))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h_, w_ = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(h*w - h_*w_)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    H, W = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    print((H-h)*(W-w))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h2, w2 = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print((h-h2)*w + (w-w2)*h2)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
